entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:26 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:31 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
